attributes.action: make people claiming benefits and able to work take part in voluntary work.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are thousands of organisations crying out for volunteers. People to visit the elderly, run youth clubs, conservation work the list is endless. Many are low on volunteers and even in danger of closing. Why not make it compulsary for people on benefits to take part in some kind of voluntary work? I know this defeats the purpose of it being voluntary but it keeps the organistions going, and the claimants are doing something for their money.
